channel.title: SpineShank
channel.description:
Hey, I was in MeadowHall the other week,[In Sheffield, i live there], i went into a HMV and next to Slayer (which i was buying) there was a album by SpineShank. So i thought oh what the hey i'll buy it. Bloody Hell They ROCK! Its Metal Music. [img]http://us.ent2.yimg.com/musicfinder.yahoo.com/images/yahoo/roadrunner/spineshank/0903_spineshank_a.jpg[/img] ^^ picture of band
Have you heard of them?
-Ollie

item.title: SpineShank
item.dc:creator: @apzrman apzrman
item.description:
@apzrman wrote:

YEAH! Spineshank kickarse!! I gotta download… I mean buy their new album. I got hoocked to their music from the “Freddy Vs. Jason” Soundtrack, that soundtrack has some of the best bands on there

item.title: SpineShank
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

I’ve never heard of them. I will have to check them out. What kind of music do they produce. Like compare it to another band. I just got this off wikipedia.org

Spineshank is a four-piece nu metal/industrial metal music group from Los Angeles, California, USA. The current status of the band which is still nameless as they have decided to no longer go by the Spineshank moniker is working on a new album. It has been announced that the remaining members of the band had found a replacement for former vocalist Jonny Santos in Brandon Espinoza.

Read full topic
